text: @CNN @PolisForCO PLEASE extend stay home order 4 more weeks due to this & they officially started the 2nd wave of coronavirus. This is not freedom! These people have zero regard for life or humanity. This is not Colorado values. Show them WE ARE NOT caving in to their ranting!
